attack!\""},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、その影響でローブがはだけ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, because of that, his robe came undone..."},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"　遂にみんなが気になっていた正体が露わに」","translatedEnglishLine":"finally revealing the true identity everyone had been curious about.\""},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ななな、なんと！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha-what!?"},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"　中からは絶世の美女が出て来ました！」","translatedEnglishLine":"An all.\""},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"「名前はリクチェルさん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Her name is Riquchel."},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"　呪いを専門とした方らしく、","translatedEnglishLine":"She seems to specialize in curses,"},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔女としてちょっと有名らしいですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"and is somewhat famous as a witch.\""},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さて、こちらのミスターＸ改め、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, this 'Mr. X', now revealed as"},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リクチェル選手、なんと攻撃を避ける寸前、","translatedEnglishLine":"player Riquchel, just before dodging the attack,"},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"　乱義選手に呪いをかけていました」","translatedEnglishLine":"cast a curse on Rangi.\""},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"「呪いの名前は暗闇モルルン。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The curse was called 'Darkness Morurun'."},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"　目が見えなくなる呪いだったそうです」","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a curse that causes blindness.\""},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今まで敵を倒してきたんも、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"All the enemies she defeated until now,"},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"　呪いの力でやったんやろうな〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"were probably due to the power of that curse.\""},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、そこは乱義選手もただでは負けません。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, Rangi would not lose so easily."},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"　音を頼りにリクチェル選手を矢で射抜こうと","translatedEnglishLine":"Relying on sound, he aimed his arrow to shoot Riquchel."},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"　弓を構えます」","translatedEnglishLine":"He readied his bow.\""},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"「対するリクチェル選手も音を出すまいと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Meanwhile, Riquchel tried not to make any sound,"},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"　慎重に行動し、結果動けなくなりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"acting carefully, which resulted in her being unable to move.\""},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……まるで達人同士の一騎打ちや」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It’s like a duel between masters.\""},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"「先に動いた方が負けそうな状況に、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In a situation where whoever moves first seems likely to lose,"},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"　会場も固唾を呑んで見守っとったで」","translatedEnglishLine":"the audience was watching breathlessly.\""},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"「結果、先に動いたのはリクチェル選手！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In the end, the first to move was Riquchel!"},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔法を使おうと杖を構え、","translatedEnglishLine":"She raised her staff to use magic,"},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そこを逃さず矢を放つ乱義選手！」","translatedEnglishLine":"and Rangi took advantage of that to shoot his arrow!\""},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"「最後まで諦めへん戦意はあっぱれやったが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Her fighting spirit that never gave up until the end was admirable, but..."},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"　残念ながら矢は外れや」","translatedEnglishLine":"Unfortunately, the arrow missed.\""},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい……奮戦空しく、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes... despite her brave fight,"},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔法を叩き込まれて乱義選手の敗北。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rangi was struck by magic and was defeated."},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これには女性ファンも泣いていました」","translatedEnglishLine":"Female fans were crying over this as well.\""},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しくしく……私も残念です……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sob sob... I’m disappointed too...\""},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"「騙し討ちされた形となるも……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Though it was a kind of surprise attack..."},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これも戦法の内っちゅうことやな」","translatedEnglishLine":"this too is part of battle tactics.\""},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"「Cブロック代表者決定戦、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"C Block representative deciding match,"},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アレキサンダーＶＳザンス・リーザス」","translatedEnglishLine":"Alexander versus Zans Lizas.\""},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"「正統派の戦士同士の戦い、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A battle between orthodox warriors,"},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"　剣と拳の試合に会場は試合が始まる前から","translatedEnglishLine":"a sword versus fists match, and the crowd was already"},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大盛り上がりを見せておりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"getting very excited even before the match started.\""},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"「みんな一流の戦士同士の戦い大好きやからね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone loves battles between top-class warriors.\""},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その期待に応えるかのように、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As if to meet those expectations,"},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"　二人は試合開始の瞬間から大技のぶつけ合い、","translatedEnglishLine":"from the moment the match started, the two exchanged powerful techniques,"},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"　惜しむことない必殺技の応酬となりました！」","translatedEnglishLine":"engaging in an all-out exchange of finishing moves!\""},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まるでこれが事実上の決勝戦かのように、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It was as if this was the real final,"},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ド派手な真っ向勝負に会場もすごい盛り上がりや」","translatedEnglishLine":"with a flashy head-on battle electrifying the arena.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞・モフス選手でした！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Cheer> It was player Mofusu!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんともお見事な決着でしたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What a splendid conclusion that was."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「強いのは、そらそうやろと思っとったが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought they were strong, of course, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、まさかこれほどとはなぁ〜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I never imagined it would be this much~

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こりゃあ優勝が誰になるか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, who will become the champion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本格的に読めへんくなってきたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's really getting impossible to predict."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Bブロック代表者決定戦、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "B Block representative deciding match,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミスターＸＶＳ山本乱義」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mr. X versus Rangi Yamamoto"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「試合開始直後、乱義選手の弓矢が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Right at the start of the match, Rangi's arrow

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミスターＸ選手に向かって放たれます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was shot toward Mr. X."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今までは試合開始直後に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Until now, just after the match starts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相手が倒れることが多かったから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: often the opponent would fall, so

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 警戒しとったんやろね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they must have been on guard."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今まで試合中に一歩も動くことのなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Until now, Mr. X had not moved a single step during matches,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミスターＸ選手もこの攻撃には慌てて避けます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but he hurriedly dodged this attack!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、その影響でローブがはだけ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, because of that, his robe came undone...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遂にみんなが気になっていた正体が露わに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: finally revealing the true identity everyone had been curious about."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ななな、なんと！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wha-what!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中からは絶世の美女が出て来ました！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An absolutely stunning beauty emerged from within!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ミスターやなかったんやねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So it wasn’t actually a Mister after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「名前はリクチェルさん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Her name is Riquchel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呪いを専門とした方らしく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She seems to specialize in curses,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔女としてちょっと有名らしいですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and is somewhat famous as a witch."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、こちらのミスターＸ改め、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, this 'Mr. X', now revealed as

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リクチェル選手、なんと攻撃を避ける寸前、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: player Riquchel, just before dodging the attack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義選手に呪いをかけていました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: cast a curse on Rangi."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「呪いの名前は暗闇モルルン。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The curse was called 'Darkness Morurun'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目が見えなくなる呪いだったそうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a curse that causes blindness."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今まで敵を倒してきたんも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "All the enemies she defeated until now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呪いの力でやったんやろうな〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were probably due to the power of that curse."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、そこは乱義選手もただでは負けません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, Rangi would not lose so easily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 音を頼りにリクチェル選手を矢で射抜こうと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Relying on sound, he aimed his arrow to shoot Riquchel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弓を構えます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He readied his bow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「対するリクチェル選手も音を出すまいと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Meanwhile, Riquchel tried not to make any sound,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 慎重に行動し、結果動けなくなりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: acting carefully, which resulted in her being unable to move."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……まるで達人同士の一騎打ちや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It’s like a duel between masters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「先に動いた方が負けそうな状況に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In a situation where whoever moves first seems likely to lose,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 会場も固唾を呑んで見守っとったで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the audience was watching breathlessly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「結果、先に動いたのはリクチェル選手！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In the end, the first to move was Riquchel!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法を使おうと杖を構え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She raised her staff to use magic,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこを逃さず矢を放つ乱義選手！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Rangi took advantage of that to shoot his arrow!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最後まで諦めへん戦意はあっぱれやったが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Her fighting spirit that never gave up until the end was admirable, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念ながら矢は外れや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unfortunately, the arrow missed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい……奮戦空しく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... despite her brave fight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法を叩き込まれて乱義選手の敗北。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangi was struck by magic and was defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これには女性ファンも泣いていました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Female fans were crying over this as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しくしく……私も残念です……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sob sob... I’m disappointed too..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「騙し討ちされた形となるも……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Though it was a kind of surprise attack...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これも戦法の内っちゅうことやな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this too is part of battle tactics."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Cブロック代表者決定戦、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "C Block representative deciding match,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダーＶＳザンス・リーザス」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alexander versus Zans Lizas."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「正統派の戦士同士の戦い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A battle between orthodox warriors,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 剣と拳の試合に会場は試合が始まる前から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a sword versus fists match, and the crowd was already

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大盛り上がりを見せておりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: getting very excited even before the match started."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みんな一流の戦士同士の戦い大好きやからね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Everyone loves battles between top-class warriors."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その期待に応えるかのように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As if to meet those expectations,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人は試合開始の瞬間から大技のぶつけ合い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: from the moment the match started, the two exchanged powerful techniques,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 惜しむことない必殺技の応酬となりました！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: engaging in an all-out exchange of finishing moves!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まるでこれが事実上の決勝戦かのように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was as if this was the real final,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ド派手な真っ向勝負に会場もすごい盛り上がりや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with a flashy head-on battle electrifying the arena."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

I’m disappointed too...\""},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"「騙し討ちされた形となるも……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Though it was a kind of surprise attack..."},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これも戦法の内っちゅうことやな」","translatedEnglishLine":"this too is part of battle tactics.\""},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"「Cブロック代表者決定戦、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"C Block representative deciding match,"},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アレキサンダーＶＳザンス・リーザス」","translatedEnglishLine":"Alexander versus Zans Lizas.\""},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"「正統派の戦士同士の戦い、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A battle between orthodox warriors,"},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"　剣と拳の試合に会場は試合が始まる前から","translatedEnglishLine":"a sword versus fists match, and the crowd was already"},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大盛り上がりを見せておりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"getting very excited even before the match started.\""},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"「みんな一流の戦士同士の戦い大好きやからね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone loves battles between top-class warriors.\""},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その期待に応えるかのように、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As if to meet those expectations,"},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"　二人は試合開始の瞬間から大技のぶつけ合い、","translatedEnglishLine":"from the moment the match started, the two exchanged powerful techniques,"},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"　惜しむことない必殺技の応酬となりました！」","translatedEnglishLine":"engaging in an all-out exchange of finishing moves!\""},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まるでこれが事実上の決勝戦かのように、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It was as if this was the real final,"},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ド派手な真っ向勝負に会場もすごい盛り上がりや」","translatedEnglishLine":"with a flashy head-on battle electrifying the arena.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞・モフス選手でした！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Cheer> It was player Mofusu!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんともお見事な決着でしたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What a splendid conclusion that was."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「強いのは、そらそうやろと思っとったが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought they were strong, of course, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、まさかこれほどとはなぁ〜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I never imagined it would be this much~

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こりゃあ優勝が誰になるか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, who will become the champion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本格的に読めへんくなってきたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's really getting impossible to predict."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Bブロック代表者決定戦、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "B Block representative deciding match,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミスターＸＶＳ山本乱義」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mr. X versus Rangi Yamamoto"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「試合開始直後、乱義選手の弓矢が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Right at the start of the match, Rangi's arrow

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミスターＸ選手に向かって放たれます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was shot toward Mr. X."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今までは試合開始直後に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Until now, just after the match starts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相手が倒れることが多かったから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: often the opponent would fall, so

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 警戒しとったんやろね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they must have been on guard."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今まで試合中に一歩も動くことのなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Until now, Mr. X had not moved a single step during matches,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミスターＸ選手もこの攻撃には慌てて避けます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but he hurriedly dodged this attack!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、その影響でローブがはだけ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, because of that, his robe came undone...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遂にみんなが気になっていた正体が露わに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: finally revealing the true identity everyone had been curious about."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ななな、なんと！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wha-what!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中からは絶世の美女が出て来ました！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An absolutely stunning beauty emerged from within!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ミスターやなかったんやねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So it wasn’t actually a Mister after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「名前はリクチェルさん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Her name is Riquchel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呪いを専門とした方らしく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She seems to specialize in curses,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔女としてちょっと有名らしいですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and is somewhat famous as a witch."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、こちらのミスターＸ改め、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, this 'Mr. X', now revealed as

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リクチェル選手、なんと攻撃を避ける寸前、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: player Riquchel, just before dodging the attack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義選手に呪いをかけていました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: cast a curse on Rangi."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「呪いの名前は暗闇モルルン。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The curse was called 'Darkness Morurun'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目が見えなくなる呪いだったそうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a curse that causes blindness."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今まで敵を倒してきたんも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "All the enemies she defeated until now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呪いの力でやったんやろうな〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were probably due to the power of that curse."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、そこは乱義選手もただでは負けません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, Rangi would not lose so easily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 音を頼りにリクチェル選手を矢で射抜こうと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Relying on sound, he aimed his arrow to shoot Riquchel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弓を構えます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He readied his bow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「対するリクチェル選手も音を出すまいと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Meanwhile, Riquchel tried not to make any sound,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 慎重に行動し、結果動けなくなりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: acting carefully, which resulted in her being unable to move."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……まるで達人同士の一騎打ちや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It’s like a duel between masters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「先に動いた方が負けそうな状況に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In a situation where whoever moves first seems likely to lose,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 会場も固唾を呑んで見守っとったで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the audience was watching breathlessly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「結果、先に動いたのはリクチェル選手！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In the end, the first to move was Riquchel!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法を使おうと杖を構え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She raised her staff to use magic,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこを逃さず矢を放つ乱義選手！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Rangi took advantage of that to shoot his arrow!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最後まで諦めへん戦意はあっぱれやったが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Her fighting spirit that never gave up until the end was admirable, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念ながら矢は外れや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unfortunately, the arrow missed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい……奮戦空しく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... despite her brave fight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法を叩き込まれて乱義選手の敗北。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangi was struck by magic and was defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これには女性ファンも泣いていました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Female fans were crying over this as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しくしく……私も残念です……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sob sob... I’m disappointed too..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「騙し討ちされた形となるも……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Though it was a kind of surprise attack...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これも戦法の内っちゅうことやな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this too is part of battle tactics."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Cブロック代表者決定戦、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "C Block representative deciding match,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダーＶＳザンス・リーザス」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alexander versus Zans Lizas."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「正統派の戦士同士の戦い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A battle between orthodox warriors,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 剣と拳の試合に会場は試合が始まる前から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a sword versus fists match, and the crowd was already

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大盛り上がりを見せておりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: getting very excited even before the match started."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みんな一流の戦士同士の戦い大好きやからね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Everyone loves battles between top-class warriors."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その期待に応えるかのように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As if to meet those expectations,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人は試合開始の瞬間から大技のぶつけ合い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: from the moment the match started, the two exchanged powerful techniques,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 惜しむことない必殺技の応酬となりました！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: engaging in an all-out exchange of finishing moves!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まるでこれが事実上の決勝戦かのように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was as if this was the real final,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ド派手な真っ向勝負に会場もすごい盛り上がりや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with a flashy head-on battle electrifying the arena."
